arcs.headline: Preparing the soil for GSoC
arcs.summary: We're tidying up our documentation and contact channels to welcome the next cohort of Google Summer of Code contributors. Fresh guides and correct mentor details ensure a smooth start for new builders joining the ecosystem.

one_liner: Polishing our documentation and mentor contacts to welcome Google Summer of Code participants.
pr_summary:
